snippet: Human Rights Watch said that child protection laws were not properly enforced, and that many cases went unreported.
abstract: Human Rights Watch report says that sexual abuse of children is disturbingly common in India and that government’s response to it has fallen short, both in protecting children and in treating victims; group urges government to better shield children from abuse as part of broad push for change after death of young woman who was gang-raped in December 2012.
lead_paragraph: Human Rights Watch said that child protection laws were not properly enforced, and that many cases went unreported.

headline.seo: Report Faults India Government Over Child Sex Abuse
headline.main: Indian Government Faulted on Child Sexual Abuse
headline.print_headline: Indian Government Faulted on Child Sexual Abuse
